member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuLinkOutput
member.summary: Contains information about a new link learnt using the algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearning
member.summary: A structural learning algorithm for Bayesian networks based on the Chow-Liu algorithm.
member.remarks: This algorithm uses tests (e.g. mutual information) to build a spanning tree, which is then directed to construct a Bayesian network.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearningOptions
member.summary: Options for structural learning with the class.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearningOptions.Root
member.summary: Gets or sets the root of the Chow-Liu tree. During construction links are directed away from this root.
member.remarks: If no root is specified, a root is chosen arbitrarily.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tests that are buffered in memory for processing in a single iteration of the data.
member.remarks: When large numbers of tests are required, instead of exhausting available memory, the tests are performed in batches. This value limits the number of tests that need to be stored in memory.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearningOutput
member.summary: Contains information returned from the algorithm.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearningOutput.LinkOutputs
member.summary: Gets information about any new links added during the learning process.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.ChowLiuStructuralLearningProgressInfo
member.summary: Progress information returned from the Chow-Liu structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ChowLiu.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes for learning the structure (links) of a Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network using the Chow-Liu algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringLinkOutput
member.summary: Contains information about a new link learnt using the algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearning
member.summary: A structural learning algorithm for a cluster model (a.k.a mixture model).

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearning.Learn(BayesServer.Data.IEvidenceReaderCommandFactory,System.Collections.Generic.IList{BayesServer.Node},BayesServer.Learning.Structure.IStructuralLearningOptions)
member.summary: Learn a cluster / mixture model.
member.param: Creates new evidence reader commands, which may be partitioned for use in cross validation.
The nodes to be considered for links.
Options for the structural learning algorithm.
member.returns: The output generated by the structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions
member.summary: Options for structural learning with the class.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.InferenceFactory
member.summary: Gets or sets the inference factory used during scoring.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.RunsPerConfiguration
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times training is re-run for each network structure tested.
member.remarks: The higher the number, the longer the tests will take, but the more accurate the tests will be.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.ClusterVariableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the cluster/latent node/variable created when more than 1 hidden state is detected.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.Partitions
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of cross validation partitions to use when scoring each cluster count.
member.remarks: The higher the number, the longer the tests will take.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumIterations
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of iterations used by parameter learning to score each configuration.
member.remarks: The higher the number, the longer the tests will take.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumClusterCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of clusters generated.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOptions.TestSingleCluster
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which determines whether a test is performed for a single cluster (i.e. no significant clusters found).

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOutput
member.summary: Contains information returned from the algorithm.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningOutput.LinkOutputs
member.summary: Gets information about any new links added during the learning process.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Clustering.ClusteringStructuralLearningProgressInfo
member.summary: Progress information returned from the Clustering structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelection
member.summary: Contains methods to determine which variables are likely to be good features (predictors) or not.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelection.Detect(System.Collections.Generic.IList{BayesServer.Variable},BayesServer.Data.IEvidenceReaderCommand,BayesServer.Variable,BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionOptions)
member.summary: Determines which variables are likely to be good features (predictors) of a target variable.
member.param: The variables to test against the target.
The data.
The target variable.
Options governing the tests.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionOptions
member.summary: Options governing the tests carried out to determine whether variables are likely to be features (predictors) of a target variable.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionOptions.MutualInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which when true calculates the mutual information between each target and test.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionOutput
member.summary: Contains information returned by about feature selection tests.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionOutput.Tests
member.summary: Gets the tests carried out for each variable against the target.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest
member.summary: Contains information about a test carried out between a variable and a target to determine whether the variable is likely to be a feature or not.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest.Variable
member.summary: Gets the variable which was tested to see if it is likely to be a feature of the variable.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest.TemporalOrder
member.summary: Gets the temporal order (if any) used to test the variables.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest.OneMinusPValue
member.summary: Gets a value which equals one minus the p-value returned from the statical independence test. The higher this value, the more likely the variable is to be a feature.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest.MutualInformation
member.summary: Gets the mutual information between the target and the test in NATS. The higher this value, the more likely the variable is to be a feature.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest.IsFeature(System.Double)
member.summary: Provides a hint as to whether the variable is likely to be a feature or not, at the given .
member.returns: true if the variable is likely to be a feature at the given , or false otherwise.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.FeatureSelectionTest.Target
member.summary: Gets the variable that was the target of the feature selection test.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Features.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes to perform feature selection.

member.summary: Contains information about a new link learnt using the algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearning
member.summary: A structural learning algorithm for Bayesian networks that groups subsets of nodes into a hierarchy.

member.summary: Learn the structure (links) of a Bayesian network.
member.param: Creates new evidence reader commands, which may be partitioned for use in cross validation.
The nodes to be considered for links.
Options for the structural learning algorithm.
member.returns: The output generated by the structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions
member.summary: Options for structural learning with the class.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumLevels
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of levels generated by the algorithm.
member.remarks: A level refers to the set of latent variables introduced by the algorithm at each stage of learning, to group variables together.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.Partitions
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of cross validation partitions to use when scoring each cluster count.
member.remarks: The higher the number, the longer the tests will take.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.RunsPerConfiguration
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times training is re-run for each network structure tested.
member.remarks: The higher the number, the longer the tests will take, but the more accurate the tests will be.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumIterations
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of iterations used by parameter learning to score each configuration.
member.remarks: The higher the number, the longer the tests will take.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.AddNodeGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which determines whether network node groups are added for each group in a level.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumGroupsPerLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of groups created per level.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumClustersPerGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of clusters generated for each group.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Hierarchical.HierarchicalStructuralLearningOptions.InferenceFactory
member.summary: Gets or sets the inference factory used during scoring.

member.summary: Contains information returned from the algorithm.

member.summary: Gets information about any new links added during the learning process.

member.summary: Progress information returned from the Hierarchical structural learning algorithm.

member.summary: Contains information about a link returned from a structural learning algorithm.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.ILinkOutput.Link
member.summary: Gets the new link.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Independence.IndependenceOptions
member.summary: Options governing independence and conditional independence tests.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Independence.IndependenceOptions.SignificanceLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the significance level used to accept or reject (conditional) independence tests.

remarks.para: Statistical (conditional) independence tests return a p-value. The null hypothesis is that two nodes are (conditionally) independent. This is rejected if the p-value is less than the .
What this means is that links are more likely with higher significance levels.
A value of 0.05 or 0.01 is usually assumed.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Independence.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes concerned with independence/conditional independence testing.

member.summary: Defines methods for learning the structure (links) of a Bayesian network.

member.summary: Interface to provide progress information during structural learning.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint
member.summary: Defines a constraint on a link between two nodes during structural learning.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.#ctor(BayesServer.Node,BayesServer.Node,BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod,BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintFailureMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The first node in the link constraint.
The second node in the link constraint.
The constraint method.
The action taken if the link constraint is violated.
member.exception: Raised if either or is null.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.#ctor(BayesServer.Node,BayesServer.Node,System.Nullable{System.Int32},BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod,BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintFailureMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The first node in the link constraint.
The second node in the link constraint.
The order of the temporal link constraint (temporal nodes only).
The constraint method.
The action taken if the link constraint is violated.
member.exception: Raised if either or is null.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.A
member.summary: Gets the first node involved in the constraint. The type of constraint is defined using the .

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.B
member.summary: Gets the second node involved in the constraint. The type of constraint is defined using the .

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.TemporalOrder
member.summary: Gets the temporal order of the constraint.
member.remarks: Used for temporal links such as those found in time series and sequence networks (Dynamic Bayesian networks).

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.Method
member.summary: Gets the method used to constrain nodes and .

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraint.FailureMode
member.summary: Gets the action to take when this link constraint is violated.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintCollection
member.summary: A collection of link constraints.
member.remarks: Link constraints can be used during structural learning to encode prior knowledge.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintFailureMode
member.summary: Determines the action taken if a link constraint cannot be honoured.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintFailureMode.ThrowException
member.summary: If the link constraint cannot be honoured, throw an exception.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintFailureMode.Ignore
member.summary: If the link constraint cannot be honoured, ignore and continue.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod
member.summary: Determines how a link is constrained.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod.AToB
member.summary: Enforces a link from A to B.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod.AToBIfExists
member.summary: If a link is detected between A and B, ensure it is directed from A to B.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod.AToBIfChoice
member.summary: If a link is detected between A and B, direct it from A to B if a choice of direction is available.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod.AToBOrBToA
member.summary: Enforces a link between A and B, in either direction.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.LinkConstraintMethod.NotAToBOrBToA
member.summary: Ensures that a link is not created between A and B.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes for learning the structure (links) of a Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes for learning the structure (links) of a Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network using the PC algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCLinkOutput
member.summary: Contains information about a new link learnt using the algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearning
member.summary: A structural learning algorithm for Bayesian networks based on the PC algorithm.
member.remarks: This algorithm uses independence and conditional independence tests to determine the structure (links) of the Bayesian network.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOptions
member.summary: Options for structural learning with the class.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tests that are buffered in memory for processing in a single iteration of the data.
member.remarks: When large numbers of tests are required, instead of exhausting available memory, the tests are performed in batches. This value limits the number of tests that need to be stored in memory.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumTemporalOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum order of temporal links that are considered during learning.
member.remarks: When learning Bayesian networks with temporal nodes (time series or sequence nodes) this value tells the algorithm the maximum order or links (sometimes referred to as the lag).

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOptions.Independence
member.summary: Gets options controlling how the independence tests are carried out.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumConditional
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of conditional variables to consider during independence testing.
member.value: The maximum number of conditional variables considered.

remarks.para: Typically a value of 3 is used.
A value of 0 means that only marginal independence tests will be performed.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOutput
member.summary: Contains information returned from the algorithm.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningOutput.LinkOutputs
member.summary: Gets information about any new links added during the learning process.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.PC.PCStructuralLearningProgressInfo
member.summary: Progress information returned from the PC structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.ScoreMethod
member.summary: The scoring mechanism used to evaluate different Bayesian network structures during a search.

member.name: F:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.ScoreMethod.CrossLogLikelihood
member.summary: The score is the log-likelihood calculated on unseen data using cross validation.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchLinkOutput
member.summary: Contains information about a new link learnt using the algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearning
member.summary: A structural learning algorithm for Bayesian networks based on Search and Score.
member.remarks: This algorithm performs a search of possible structures based on moves that are evaluated using a scoring function.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearning.Learn(BayesServer.Data.IEvidenceReaderCommandFactory,System.Collections.Generic.IList{BayesServer.Node},BayesServer.Learning.Structure.IStructuralLearningOptions)
member.summary: Learn the structure (links) of a Bayesian network.
member.param: Creates new evidence reader commands, which may be partitioned for use in cross validation.
The nodes to be considered for links.
Options for the structural learning algorithm.
member.returns: The output generated by the structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions
member.summary: Options for structural learning with the class.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.PartitionCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of partitions used by scoring functions that use cross validation.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumIterations
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional maximum number of iterations (moves) made during the search procedure. By default, no maximum is set.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.ToleranceOrDefault
member.summary: If Tolerance is null, this returns the default tolerance for the given scoring method, otherwise Tolerance is returned.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.Tolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the tolerance used to determine whether or not a search move is a significant improvement.
member.remarks:
This is a non negative number which indicates that learning will only stop when the relative difference between scores between moves is no greater than this value.
When null, a default value is used which depends on the Score Method in use.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.ScoreMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the scoring method used to evaluate search moves.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.InferenceFactory
member.summary: Gets or sets the inference factory used during scoring.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.Stopping
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance implementing used for early stopping.
member.remarks: Stopping is different to cancellation, as stopping will still complete the learning process, albeit having performed fewer iterations.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOptions.TestIndependence
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which when true uses independence tests to reduce the search space.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOutput
member.summary: Contains information returned from the algorithm.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningOutput.LinkOutputs
member.summary: Gets information about any new links added during the learning process.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.Search.SearchStructuralLearningProgressInfo
member.summary: Progress information returned from the Search based structural learning algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes for learning the structure (links) of a Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network using the Tree Augmented Naive Bayes algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANLinkOutput
member.summary: Contains information about a new link learnt using the algorithm.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearning
member.summary: A structural learning algorithm for Bayesian networks based on the Tree augmented naive Bayes (TAN) algorithm.

remarks.para: This algorithm uses tests (e.g. mutual information) conditional on a target to build a spanning tree, which is then directed to construct a Bayesian network with additional links added from the target. Often used for classification of the target.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningOptions
member.summary: Options for structural learning with the class.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningOptions.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the target of the TAN tree.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningOptions.Root
member.summary: Gets or sets the root of the TAN tree. During construction links are directed away from this root.
member.remarks: If no root is specified, a root is chosen arbitrarily.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningOptions.MaximumBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tests that are buffered in memory for processing in a single iteration of the data.
member.remarks: When large numbers of tests are required, instead of exhausting available memory, the tests are performed in batches. This value limits the number of tests that need to be stored in memory.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningOutput
member.summary: Contains information returned from the algorithm.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningOutput.LinkOutputs
member.summary: Gets information about any new links added during the learning process.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Learning.Structure.TAN.TANStructuralLearningProgressInfo
member.summary: Progress information returned from the TAN structural learning algorithm.
